product_name: Eastern Sierra Ice: The Guide's Guide to Sierra Waterfalls and Alpine Ice Routes
long_description: What started out as a small online guide to Lee Vining and June Lake has now turned into this printed version with a greatly expanded area. Author: Robert "SP" Parker. Softcover; 54 pages; full-color photos and maps. Robert "SP" Parker; copyright 2006. Waterfall ice climbs include Lundy Canyon, Lee Vining, June Lake, Parker Canyon and more. Alpine ice climbs include North Peak, Mount Dana, Red Slate Mountain, The Mendel Couloirs and Mount Darwin. Plus, Mount Gilbert, Mount Thompson, Mount Humphreys, Kindergarten Gully, Checkered Demon, U-Notch, V-Notch, Clyde Couloir and others. Features short approaches for a fun day of climbing or long multi-day excursions in the back country. All routes are illustrated by color photos and a detailed description drawn from the author's intimate knowledge of the Sierra and its climbing routes.
short_description: What started out as a small online guide to Lee Vining and June Lake has now turned into this printed version with a greatly expanded area.
